text: 7:3 Matyu 5:32Gumazim angamɨra ikɨvɨra ikɨtɨ, amizim gumazir igharazim ko dakuightɨ, me amizir kam mɨkɨm suam, a poroghamiba uari bakeir arazim gamir amizim. Amizir kamɨn pam aremeghtɨ, Moses Osirizir Arazim a ikeghan koghtɨ a fɨrighɨrɨgham. Kamaghɨn, a gumazir igharazimɨn ikɨtɨ, me kamaghɨn mɨkɨman kogham, a poroghamiba uari bakeir arazim gami. Puvatɨ.
